about_the_game:
Discover the story of Aida, a girl from an African ghetto, for whom the only way to survive is to escape in search of the "E" continent. Help her run away, get to know her secrets.
AIDA is a game that incorporates movie content in a unique never-before-seen way. AIDA is an movie/game experience co-produced by the co-creatives of the Oscar-nominated "Corpus Christi" movie. The AIDA game concept has been awarded the prestigious Creative Europe.

Begin your adventure in the Thanos ghetto and discover the violent world of men who were forced to live the way they do. Every decision will have consequences.

Features


  • solve movie puzzles
  • make use of quicktime events
  • make choices
  • influence Aida's psyche
  • collect items

content_descriptors.notes: Violence, threats, usage of knifes and guns, physical violence, blood.
